body:
^^
Mine were,
In Fable II, Do you save 1,000 Innocent People, or You're family(Your Sister who was killed by the Main Antagonist when you were children, You're Wife and Kids, and your Dog who sacrificed himself for you)

and in Oblivion, Do I take a dump now? Or do I do it after I finish this quest?!?!1121

title: Hardest  Decisions you ever had to make?

replies.body:
Future in life, I may receive this question.

If your mother and girlfriend was drowning, who would you save?
